alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 1:39PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 215 PM MST... At 139 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kings Ranch, or near Gold Canyon, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Apache Junction, Gold Canyon, Kings Ranch and Gold Camp. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 199 and 208. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior
